isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Cylinder Head And Valves - Inspection - Check for Valve Leakage (Using Mineral Spirits)

svcproc.title: Check for Valve Leakage (Using Mineral Spirits)

step1.para: Position cylinder head on wood blocks with the gasket surface facing down.
Squirt mineral spirits into intake and exhaust ports.
Wait five minutes. Use an inspection mirror to inspect valve seat area for any indication of mineral spirits leakage.

svcproc.para: There should be no leakage. Reconditioning is not required if the cylinder head passes this valve leakage check. If leakage is observed, the valves and seats require reconditioning.
